name: Persona!
bio: The country’s finest stand-up comedians are invited to perform as their funniest characters in a show called by Laughspin Magazine, "A total riot” and ”a stand out," at the Bridgetown Comedy Festival. The show features the many faces of Tony Sam as host.
copy: The country’s finest stand-up comedians are invited to perform as their funniest characters in a show called by Laughspin Magazine, "A total riot” and ”a stand out," at the Bridgetown Comedy Festival. The show features the many faces of Tony Sam as host.
